page.title: 01LEAMINGTON SPA 1985.
page.content: Domesday Survey 1985 approaches, eagerly the youthful commissioners of Cashmore Middle School and Trinity R.C Secondary School prepare to survey their 3x4km D-Block. The area which falls to our lot covers the territory to the east of Leamington Spa Parade and Brunswick St. The 12km sq. rectangle covers the suburbs of Lillington, the modern Sydenham Estate, Radford Semele and Whitnash. The area spreads east across the popular recreational facilities of the Campion Hills and Newbold Comyn to the serenity of the ancient Bury of Offchurch. Enriched by the variety of architecture, beautiful parks, popular shopping facilities, and developing light industry, the area continues to attract visitors and residents from near and far.
